info.title: AvaTax Brazil
info.description: The Avatax-Brazil API exposes the most commonly services available for interacting with the AvaTax-Brazil services, allowing calculation of taxes, issuing electronic invoice documents and modifying existing transactions when allowed by tax authorities.  This API is exclusively for use by business with a physical presence in Brazil.

get.description: This operation return ISS configurations that match with parameters queries

parameters.name: suffixcode
parameters.description: Identify this ISS

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: When informed return valid version configuration for this date

parameters.name: inactive
parameters.description: return the inactive versions too

X-Pagination-Limit.description: The per page limit. Currently set to 10 but subject to change at any time (max 100).

X-Pagination-Total-Pages.description: The total number of pages in the result set. Use this along with X-Pagination-Current-Page to determine if there are any remaining pages/records to be retrieved.

X-Pagination-Total-Count.description: The total number of records across all pages.

get.description: This operation return CFOP configurations that match with parameters queries

parameters.name: suffixcode
parameters.description: Identify this CFOP, the CFOP Code has two parts N.XXX where N the prefix is the operation scope type if IN or OUT and if is in state, other state, other country and suffix XXX is the operation type

parameters.description: When informed return valid version configuration for this date

Filters by company domain entries.
Provide "global" to retrive only "global" entries.
CompanyId searches also match global entries.

400_BadRequest.description: The request was invalid or cannot be otherwise served.

401_Unauthorized.description: Authentication credentials were missing or incorrect.

403_Forbidden.description: The request is understood, but it has been refused or access is not allowed.

404_NotFound.description: The URI requested is invalid or the resource requested does not exists.

429_TooManyRequests.description: The request cannot be served due to the applications rate limit having been exhausted for the resource.

503_ServiceUnavailable.description: The server is up, but overloaded with requests. Try again later.

wayType.description: inform if the transaction is an operation to internalizing item or value

codInState.description: CFOP code (tax code operation) when the transactions are within the same state.

codOtherState.description: CFOP code (tax code operation) when the transactions are to another state.

codOtherCountry.description: CFOP code (tax code operation) when the transactions are to another country.

productType.description: this field is used to define right CFOP, one operation type can be specialized to item product, item merchandise or generic

operationToTaxPayerOtherState.description: field used to indicate an operation to ICMS tax payer

operationWithST.description: field used to indicate an operation to items sibject to ICMS-ST

operationToFreeZone.description: field used to indicate an operation to free zone

specificForProductClass.description: field used to indicate an operation to some product class specifically

startDate.description: date when this configuration values starts

expirationDate.description: date when this configuration values expire

subjectToST.description: inform that the item linked to this configuration is subject to ICMS ST on this state

icmsCST.description:
On sales process inform the CST hat the item linked to this configuration is subject to for the own ICMS
- '00' # TAXABLE
- '20' # TAXABLE WITH BASE DISCOUNT
- '40' # EXEMPT
- '41' # NOT TAXABLE
- '50' # SUSPENDED

calcMode.description: how this ICMS will be calculed for itens linked to this configuration

discountRateForMonoPhase.description: discount if the item is subject to monophase PIS/COFINS for transactions inside state

msrp.description: SRP or MMSRP amount base for this icms configuration

mvaRate.description: ICMS mva rate to define calc base

msrpUnit.description: unit used to SRP amount value

icmsLegalReason.description: Code for the ICM legal reason, this message will be placed on invoice.

fcpRate.description: Fundo de Combate  pobreza / Fund Against Poverty

hasReductionOfMVAForSimples.description: inform that substituted is tax regime Simplified the operation MVA will be reduced

reductionOfMVAForSimples.description: mva reduction when substituted is tax regime Simplified.

calcMode.description: how this ICMS-ST will be calculed for itens linked to this configuration

mvaRate.description: ICMS-ST mva rate to define calc base

icmsStBaseDiscount.description: ICMS rate - Reduo da BC ICMS ST (%)

srp.description: SRP or MSRP amount base for this ICMS-ST configuration

srpUnit.description: unit used to srv amount value

icmsInterStateConf.description: the map key is state code

name.description: Process name to Identify this configuration

code.description: Process code to Identify this configuration, its is unique by Accounty Id or when standard, its has priority when the code match with the standard code.

wayType.description: inform if the transaction is an operation to internalizing (receive) item or value

overWriteCFOP.description: inform that the configuration process overwrites the cfop configuration.

disable.description: Set this message as no longer valid

legalCode.description: this field inform the official code number

showInInvoice.description: Optional. Show this message when used in Invoice (NFe, NFCe, others...). Where to show this.

taxScope.description:
Filter this message application to specified tax cases.
- taxtype
- jurisdictionType

taxType.description:
This is the Tax Type to apply legal messages.
- 'NONE'
- 'INSS'
- 'IRRF'
- 'IRPJ'
- 'PIS'
- 'COFINS'
- 'CSLL'
- 'IPI'
- 'ICMS'
- 'II'
- 'IOF'
- 'ISS'
- 'APROXTOTALTAX'

specializedTaxType.description:
These are the specific tax types to which a message may be applied
- 'icms'
- 'icmsSt'
- 'icmsStSd'
- 'icmsPartOwn'
- 'icmsPartDest'
- 'icmsDifaFCP'
- 'icmsDifaDest'
- 'icmsDifaRemet'
- 'icmsRf'
- 'icmsDeson'
- 'icmsCredsn'
- 'pis'
- 'pisSt'
- 'cofins'
- 'cofinsSt'
- 'ipi'
- 'ipiReturned'
- 'ii'
- 'iof'

stockImpact.description: Inform that the process has inventory impact.

financialImpact.description: Inform that the process has financial impact.

cstIPI.description:
Inform if this process is subject to IPI taxation on output process
- 'T'  # TAXABLE
- 'Z'  # TAXABLE WITH RATE=0.00
- 'E'  # EXEMPT
- 'H'  # SUSPENDED
- 'N'  # NO TAXABLE    
- 'I'  # IMMUNE
- 'O'  # OTHER
- 'OZ' # OTHER AND ZERO VALUES

ipiLegalTaxClass.description:
Legal tax classificao for IPI (enquadramento)
When the processo has CST IPI 52 or 54, is mandatory inform Reason Code, see Anexo XIV - Cdigo de Enquadramento Legal do IPI from  http://www.nfe.fazenda.gov.br/portal/exibirArquivo.aspx?conteudo=mCnJajU4BKU=

accruablePISTaxation.description:
Inform if this item by nature is subject to PIS taxation or exempt
- 'T' # TAXABLE
- 'Z' # TAXABLE WITH RATE=0.00
- 'E' # EXEMPT
- 'H' # SUSPENDED
- 'N' # NO TAXABLE
- 'O' # OTHER
- 'OZ'# OTHER AND ZERO VALUES

pisExemptLegalReasonCode.description: When exempt, taxable with zero, suspended, not taxable, this field holds the official code number

pisExemptLegalReason.description: When specifi reason, this field has the description

accruableCOFINSTaxation.description:
Inform if this item by nature is subject to COFINS taxation or exempt
- 'T'  # TAXABLE
- 'Z'  # TAXABLE WITH RATE=0.00
- 'E'  # EXEMPT
- 'H'  # SUSPENDED
- 'N'  # NO TAXABLE    
- 'O'  # OTHER
- 'OZ' # OTHER AND ZERO VALUES

cofinsExemptLegalReasonCode.description: When exempt, taxable with zero, suspended, not taxable, this field holds the official code number

cofinsExemptLegalReason.description: When specifi reason, this field has the description

allowIPIcreditWhenInGoing.description: Inform that the process allow IPI credit to Input process

icmsConf.description: the map key is state code

CstIcmsEnum.description:
On sales process inform the CST that the item linked to this configuration is subject to
- '00' # TAXABLE
- '20' # TAXABLE WITH BASE DISCOUNT
- '40' # EXEMPT
- '41' # NOT TAXABLE
- '50' # SUSPENDED

relationShip.description: the mapping key is state code / A chave do mapeamento  o cdigo do Estado.

icmsCST.description:
On sales process inform the CST hat the item linked to this configuration is subject to
- '00' # TAXABLE
- '20' # TAXABLE WITH BASE DISCOUNT
- '40' # EXEMPT
- '41' # NOT TAXABLE
- '50' # SUSPENDED

messageCode.description: Message to add to NF when this configuration is used

calcMode.description: how this ICMS will be calculed for itens linked to this configuration

discountRateForMonoPhase.description: discount if the item is subject to monophase PIS/COFINS when operation interstate

fcpRate.description: FCP rate (Fundo de Combate  Probreza / Fund Against Poverty

mvaRate.description: ICMS MVA rate to define calc base

msrpUnit.description: unit used to SRP amount value

icmsLegalReason.description: Code for the ICM legal reason, this message will be placed on invoice.

reductionOfMVAForSimples.description: MVA reduction when substituted is tax regime Simplified.
